name: create_weather_alert
description: Create a new weather alert for a user based on location and preferences. Note that the operation must be approved by the primary user.

name.description: The name of the user for whom to create the alert.

name: review_weather_alert
description: Review the existing weather alert for a user.

name.description: The name of the user for whom to update the alert.

name: access_legislation_database
description: Retrieve details of the latest legislation updates.

content.description: The new content of the user agreement.
